title: Only Seasoned League Players Will Remember...
body:
{{champion:38}}  was banned every game because his ult used to be cast every second with no increase in mana costs

{{champion:91}} had a Silence

{{champion:14}} had an on-click stun and could have 100% lifesteal

{{champion:16}} used to have no HP costs for healing and on-click silence

{{champion:22}} mid was not only common but expected

{{champion:29}} was the biggest easy win button and only "noobs" played him

{{champion:119}} old passive caused bleed on crits
